snippet.title: Reus 2 - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1875060/Reus_2/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=direct&utm_campaign=announcement&utm_content=trailer_bio

Shape humanity with the power of the gods in Reus 2. Choose your giants, combine resources, and manipulate fate to guide the path of civilization. The choices are yours, and so are the consequences.

Reus 2
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1875060/Reus_2/
Discord - https://discord.gg/EANmk2rbVG
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/ReusTheGame
Twitter - https://twitter.com/ReusTheGame
Official website - http://reus2game.com/

Firesquid
Discord - https://discord.gg/vsxD6n8P8J
Twitter - https://twitter.com/FiresquidGames
Official website - https://www.firesquid.fr

Abbey Games
Discord - https://discord.gg/ZwKrPws
Twitter - https://twitter.com/AbbeyGamesNL
Official website - https://abbeygames.com

-----------------------------------------------

Trailer:
Vanessa Williams
https://notthatvanessawilliams.com/
